description: Use this operation to find which experiments or launches are using a specified segment.

parameters.name: segment
parameters.description: The ARN of the segment that you want to view information for.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return information about launches or experiments that use this segment.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use in a subsequent ListSegmentReferences operation to return the next set of results.

nested_items.name: referencedBy
nested_items.description: An array of structures, where each structure contains information about one experiment or launch that uses this segment.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the experiment or launch.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: The day and time that this experiment or launch ended.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedOn
nested_items.description: The day and time that this experiment or launch was most recently updated.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the experiment or launch.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: The day and time that this experiment or launch started.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the experiment or launch.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the resource that this structure contains information about is an experiment or a launch.
